participant_1.background:
I rarely use social media and prefer to spend my time outdoors.
i have never been on an airplane.
I sometimes donate a portion of my art sales to animal welfare organizations without telling my parents.
I am working on losing weight to improve my health.
I started a blog to share my love of romance novels with others.

participant_2.background:
I drank a cup of chai tea before going to bed.
I treasure my collection of little figurines, which I have been collecting for many years.
I want to be able to combine my two passions, football and technology, by creating a wearable device that can track my performance on the pitch.
i am a paper salesman.
i deliver packages for a living.

content.text: Hey there, how are you doing?
Great, thanks for asking! Just got home from work.
Oh, what do you do for a living?
I deliver packages for a living. What about you?
I am an artist and a writer.
Oh, that's really cool! What kind of art do you do?
I paint, I do pottery, and I write romance novels.
Wow, that's amazing! I've always wanted to be an artist but I don't have the talent.
Oh, you're too kind. Anyone can be an artist, it just takes practice.
I've tried but I'm just not good at it.
Well, you're good at something, I'm sure! What do you like to do for fun?
I like to watch football, play video games, and collect little figurines.
Oh, I like to play video games too! What are some of your favorites?
I love to play football games, racing games, and open world games.
Cool, I like to play racing games and open world games too.
What kind of art do you like to paint?
I like to paint landscapes, portraits, and abstract art.
Wow, I'd love to see some of your work sometime.
Sure, I can send you some pictures.
Great! I'd love to see them.
